DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the prevalence, during the enrolment, of Left Ventricular Dysfunction diastolic and/or systolic in patients with diabetes mellitus type 2 without known or documented heart disease history and recognize its predictive clinical, biohumoral and with non-invasive techniques parameters.
DOC.criteria: diabetes mellitus type 2 absence of heart disease previously reported age >45 years Informed Consent presence of heart disease previously reported diabetes type 1 serious systemic disease, with an expected lifetime lower than 2 years no willingness to participate to the screening inadequate compliance to study procedure participation to other study
